name: legal-code-rag
description: In this project we explore implementing a basic and then an advanced RAG system using techniques like windowing, hybrid-search, query rewriting and routing. We also explore evaluating these techniques and others to help make choices about the RAG pipeline components. More details and a step by step tutorial here: https://medium.com/@hamzagharbi_19502/building-a-comprehensive-rag-system-advanced-features-and-in-depth-evaluation-3551be31858f
